Pre-Game Insights: India will be high on confidence after the T20I series win.
The addition of experienced players like Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, KL Rahul, and Kuldeep Yadav will be a boost in confidence for India.
Riyan Parag, Shivam Dube, and Harshit Rana have earned their maiden call-ups to the ODI side.
Charith Asalanka has been named the new ODI captain of Sri Lanka and will be hoping to bounce back in the 50-over format.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The surface at R. Premadasa Stadium is expected to be a well-balanced one.
There is a 70% chance of rain predicted, with the temperature expected to be in the mid-20s.
India have won 99 times against Sri Lanka in the 50-over format.
Others: Matheesha Pathirana and Dilshan Madhushanka have been ruled out of the ODI series due to injuries.
Uncapped seamers Mohamed Shiraz and Eshan Malinga have been added to the Sri Lankan squad.
All the players in the Indian squad are fully fit.
